resources.string: Please make sure that Wi-Fi is available and connected to the correct network.
While loading the managed services from configuration, the following error occurred:
Service data could not be saved.
The service could not be saved.
No services have been defined yet. Use the \"Create\" button to create a new one.
Looking up the service in the local networkâ€¦
The state of the Wi-Fi connection could not be obtained.
During the service discovery operation, an error occurred.
No response was received from service \'%1s\' within the configured timeout.\n\nPlease double-check the configuration of this service and make sure that it is actually running in the Wi-Fi network.
Do you really want to delete the service \'%1s\'?
The service name must be a non-empty string without leading or trailing whitespace.
This must be a valid IP address, e.g. 231.1.120.17.
This must be a valid port number in the range of 0 to 65535.
The request code must be a non-empty string without leading or trailing whitespace.
Please enter a number greater than 0 for the timeout in seconds.
Please enter a number greater than 0 for the interval in milliseconds.
Please enter a valid URL under which the service can be reached.
